name:          BugMonkey Markdown
description:   Markdown for FogBugz Editor
author:        Christopher Hiller <chiller@badwing.com>
version:       1.1.0


js:

a=$(l);a.length&&(c=b.CodeMirror.fromTextArea(a[0],{mode:"gfm",lineWrapping:!0,theme:localStorage[j+".THEME_NAME"]||"default",tabindex:a.attr("tabindex")}),a.keypress(function(a){return 96===a.which?!1:void 0}),$(p).preempt({attr:"onclick",event:t,before:z,after:w}),$(m).append(v),console.info("BugMonkey Markdown: initialized CodeMirror editor"),u=!0)},w=function(){$(p).preempt({attr:"onclick",event:t,restore:!0}),$(o).remove(),v.remove(),console.info("BugMonkey Markdown: destroyed editor"),u=!1},x=function(a){var b=a.target,c=$(b);if(b.id===k){if(u&&c.hasClass(q))return w();u||c.hasClass(q)||i()}},y=function(a){var b,c,f,g,j=$(s);for(a=a||{addedNodes:j.length?[j[0]]:[],removedNodes:[]},b=a.addedNodes,c=a.removedNodes,f=b.length;f--;)if(g=b[f],g.className===r&&!u){"true"!==h&&i(),e=$(l),d.observe(e[0],{attributes:!0});break}for(f=c.length;f--;)if(g=c[f],g.className===r&&u){w();break}},z=function(){var a,b=$(l);c.save(),a=b.val(),b.val(new Showdown.converter({extensions:["fogbugz"]}).makeHtml(a))};return g.length?(a=$(n),f=new MutationObserver(function(a){a.forEach(y)}),d=new MutationObserver(function(a){a.forEach(x)}),f.observe(a[0],{childList:!0}),void y()):void console.warn("BugMonkey Markdown: not on a bug page")},x=function(a){$("<link/>",{rel:"stylesheet",type:"text/css",href:a}).appendTo("head")};x(i),e=localStorage[j+".THEME_URL"],e&&x(e),b.Showdown=Showdown,$.getScript(g).then(function(){return $.when.apply($,h.map(function(a){return $.getScript(a)}))}).then(function(){console.info("BugMonkey Markdown: fit to get my party on"),$(w)}).fail(function(a){console.error(a)})}(jQuery,window);!function(){"use strict";var a=function(){return[{type:"output",filter:function(a){return a.replace(/<pre><code.*?>([\s\S]+)<\/code><\/pre>/gi,function(a,b){return"<p>\n&lt;code&gt;</p>\n"+b.split("\n").map(function(a){return"<div>"+a.replace(/\s\s/g,"&nbsp; ")+"</div>"}).join("\n")+"<div>\n&lt;/code&gt;</div>"})}}]};"undefined"!=typeof window&&window.Showdown&&window.Showdown.extensions&&(window.Showdown.extensions.fogbugz=a),"undefined"!=typeof module&&(module.exports=a)}();

css:

.CodeMirror{border:1px solid #4a5b79;height:198px!important}
